item.title: XMLHttpRequest vs Fetch API
item.description: In this article, we will have a simple comparison on the XMLHttpRequest code and Fetch API code. XMLHttpRequest(XHR) objects are used to interact with servers, it uses the concept of AJAX where we can retrieve the data from a URL or backend without having to do a full-page refresh. In this case, I will be using JSON object as my Request Payload. It’s gonna something like this. 1var jsonObj = {}; 2jsonObj.

item.title: Password Detector

item.title: Build Your Backend Server with GOLANG
item.description: Want to build a web server but don’t know how to start ?? We will be showing a step by step procedure from installation to configuration of server by using Gorilla Mux Library

item.title: Setup Redis On Window
item.description: In this article, we will show how to install and configure Redis on Window, We will be setting up the redis server, install Redis Desktop Manager as GUI
